article_title: Diseases spread in Gaza as sewage contaminates camps and coast
sentence: On  7  October,  Hamas  launched  unprecedented  assault  on  Israel,  in  which  about  1,200  people  were  killed  and  251  others  were  taken  back  to  Gaza  as  hostages.

article_title: Diseases spread in Gaza as sewage contaminates camps and coast
sentence: Since  the  attack,  the  Israeli  military  operation  in  Gaza  has  killed  more  than  40,200  Palestinians,  according  to  the  Hamas-run  health  ministry.
